[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: cancel_user_withdraw()] [Receipt Validation] receipt_id at line 521 - can operator provide wrong receipt_id to cancel another user's withdraw and claim their shares? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: cancel_user_withdraw()] [Cancel Timing] Clock at line 523 - if withdraw has locking period, can operator bypass by canceling during lock? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: cancel_user_withdraw()] [Returned Shares] The returned u256 shares are not transferred back to user in this function - does caller handle returning shares to receipt, or can they be stolen? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: deposit_by_operator()] [Operator Deposit No Shares] Operator deposits coin at line 541 - does this mint shares to operator or increase NAV without minting, diluting existing users? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: deposit_by_operator()] [Oracle Config Direct] deposit_by_operator uses oracle config at line 534 - if config is stale, does operator get to deposit at manipulated prices? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: deposit_by_operator()] [No Slippage Protection] Unlike execute_deposit, there's no max_shares parameter - can operator force deposit at any share price? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: deposit_by_operator()] [Freeze Check Only] Only checks operator not frozen at line 537 - if operator cap is stolen or compromised, can attacker deposit malicious assets? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: deposit_by_operator()] [Coin Type Validation] Coin<PrincipalCoinType> at line 535 - if operator somehow deposits wrong coin type that passes type check, does it corrupt vault principal? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: add_new_coin_type_asset()] [No Asset Validation] add_new_coin_type_asset at line 553 - can operator add arbitrary AssetType without validating it's a valid coin type or has value? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: add_new_coin_type_asset()] [Type Collision] If AssetType already exists in vault's coin_type_assets, does add fail or overwrite existing asset? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: add_new_coin_type_asset()] [Asset Count Limit] Is there a limit on how many coin_type_assets can be added? Can operator DoS by adding thousands of types? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: remove_coin_type_asset()] [Non-Zero Balance] If coin_type_asset being removed has non-zero balance, does remove fail or allow asset loss? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: remove_coin_type_asset()] [Active Position Check] If AssetType is currently borrowed in an active operation, can operator remove it and break the operation? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: remove_coin_type_asset()] [Type Reuse] After removal, can the same AssetType be re-added, and does this create accounting confusion? (Low)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: add_new_defi_asset()] [Idx Collision] idx parameter at line 569 - if idx already exists for different asset, does add fail or overwrite? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: add_new_defi_asset()] [Asset Ownership] asset parameter at line 570 - is ownership transferred to vault, or can operator retain reference and manipulate asset? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: add_new_defi_asset()] [Asset Type Validation] AssetType must be key + store - but is there validation that asset actually represents a valid DeFi position? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: add_new_defi_asset()] [Idx Range] Is idx bounded (u8 allows 0-255)? Can operator exhaust idx space? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: remove_defi_asset_support()] [Active Borrow Check] If asset at idx is currently borrowed in active operation, does removal fail or succeed causing operation to fail on return? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: remove_defi_asset_support()] [Asset Return] Function returns AssetType at line 583 - is caller responsible for properly handling returned asset, or can they drop it causing value loss? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Function: remove_defi_asset_support()] [Idx Validation] If idx doesn't exist, does function panic or return empty/default asset? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Cross-Function] [Operation Interleaving] If start_op_with_bag() is called, but before end_op_with_bag() completes, another operator calls deposit_by_operator(), can it corrupt the operation's value snapshot? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Cross-Function] [TxBag Reuse] Can TxBag created in one start_op_with_bag call be saved and reused in a future end_op_with_bag call after vault state changes? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Cross-Function] [Status Inconsistency] If end_op_with_bag() succeeds but end_op_value_update_with_bag() fails, vault remains in DURING_OPERATION status - is there recovery mechanism? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/operation.move] [Cross-Function] [Deposit/Withdraw During Op] Can execute_deposit or execute_withdraw be called while vault status is DURING_OPERATION, bypassing status checks? (Critical)
